parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: CreateTimestampList
parameters.description: The timestamps when the snapshots that you want to delete were captured.

parameters.name: RemoveFile
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to also delete the corresponding file in Object Storage Service (OSS) at the same time. Value values:

*   **true**: deletes the corresponding file in OSS.
*   **false**: does not delete the corresponding file in OSS.

>  To delete the corresponding file in OSS, you must have the permissions on the OSS bucket.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
